Once you have managed to expand your base further, you may want to bridge over to the quest island. Here you will be able to see a list of all the objectives you need to finish to complete the map. In higher difficulty levels of the map, you may find that an objective has multiple goals you need to finish to complete the objective successfully.

Note: While you may build any needed pipes across the quest island to connect to the required input, you should not ever break any of the blocks on the quest island or place any blocks directly onto the island.
